repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: State University of New York at Albany. Office of University Relations

did.abstract: This collection consists of the University Update publication, as well as its predecessor publications produced by the same office.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Initial processing of the University Update series completed in 2016 by Erik Stolarski. Processing and arrangement of additional series completed in 2019 by Miles Lawlor.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: UAlbany has produced a number of different publications throughout its history targeted at members of the faculty. From 1952 to 2006, the Office of University Relations and its predecessors produced a series of publications aimed at keeping members of the faculty informed of campus events, university news, outside press coverage of the University, and faculty activities and publications. While these publications went by different titles over the years, the university's faculty and staff were always the primary audience. The Faculty Bulletin of Information (FBI) was a weekly general interest newsletter of campus and faculty activity published by Elmer Matthews of the Placement Office until 1964 November. After this date publication was taken over by the Public Relations Office. The FBI was succeeded by Campus Courier (1966-1969). Following the Campus Courier were the Tower Tribune, the University News, and the University Update. The University Update appears to have ceased publication in May of 2006.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of issues of the University Update (1987-2006) as well as its predecessor publications, the University News (1978-1986), the Tower Tribune (1970-1977) the Campus Courier (1966-1969) and the Faculty Bulletin of Information (1952-1966). These newsletters were produced by the University Relations Office and its predecessors.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials in each series have been arranged chronologically.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: All items in this collection were transferred to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: This page may contain links to digital objects. Access to these images and the technical capacity to download them does not imply permission for re-use. Digital objects may be used freely for personal reference use, referred to, or linked to from other web sites.
Researchers do not have permission to publish or disseminate material from these collections without permission from an archivist and/or the copyright holder.

The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming to the laws of copyright. Some materials in these collections may be protected by the U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) and/or by the copyright or neighboring-rights laws of other nations. More information about U.S. Copyright is provided by the Copyright Office. Additionally, re-use may be restricted by terms of University Libraries gift or purchase agreements, donor restrictions, privacy and publicity rights, licensing and trademarks.

The M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collection and Archives is eager to hear from any copyright owners who are not properly identified so that appropriate information may be provided in the future.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, University Update Collection, 1952-2006. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the University Update Collection).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of issues of the university publication Faculty Bulletin of Information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of issues of the university publication Campus Courier.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of issues of the university publication Tower Tribune.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of issues of the university publication University News.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of copies of the university publication University Update.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of digital versions of the university publication University Update preserved via a webcrawler. Files in this series generally convey the same information as the materials in the previous series, although it appears that some online issues of the Update included additional articles.
